price: Indeed, We have presented for mankind all kinds of examples in this Qur’an, so that they may take heed –
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
